name: part_010
file: tmp_《BIRDS NIGHT OUT》 Pavolia Reine 3D Birthday Live 2024 #ReineMeptember2024 [DNDhaDTXta4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: The end of the performance of 'Night Dancer'.
MC section where Reine reflects on the guest performances and announces a DJ segment.
Intro to the DJ segment featuring penlight shots and a transition to the booth.
DJ medley performance starts with a cover of 'Next Color Planet'.
DJ medley performance continues with Reine's original song 'Jollie Jollie'.
